channel.title: Shops won't work!
channel.description:
ok for my shops i used npc that have standard rs 2 shop and modified em first i changed their location in autospawn.cfg (this example will be for the falador mace seller his id is 580) [code]spawn = 580 3213 3425 0 0 0 0 0 1 barrows armor shopkeeper[/code]
then i modified their shop [code]shop = 5 Flynn's_Barrows_Armor 1 1 4709 1000 4713 1000 4715 1000 4717 1000 4721 1000 4723 1000 4725 1000 4729 1000 4731 1000 4733 1000 4737 1000 4739 1000 4746 1000 4750 1000 4752 1000 4754 1000 4758 1000 4760 1000[/code]
i've made a shop before the only difference is that i didn't change their location oh and i also changedn buy and sell to 1.
plz help its driving me mad (you may already have noticed i'm not very experienced at making servers it my first) :eek: plz help a poor newb out! ;D
do i need to change anything in shophandler.java or something? :confused:
grtz

item.title: Shops won't work!
item.dc:creator: @fascismo fascismo
item.description:
@fascismo wrote:

thz a bunch
meanwhile i figured out another way don’t delete the original autospawn line just adjust the coords of the existing line. of course your solution is much cooler ;D.

thz!!!

item.title: Shops won't work!
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

Go to client.java, search for wanneshop =

Add this:

} else if (NPCID == 580) { // Falador Mace seller. PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 5; // Barrows Armour Store

Your welcome

item.title: Shops won't work!

item.description:
@fascismo wrote:

ok for my shops i used npc that have standard rs 2 shop and modified em
first i changed their location in autospawn.cfg (this example will be for the falador mace seller his id is 580)

spawn = 580	3213	3425	0	0	0	0	0	1	barrows armor shopkeeper

then i modified their shop

shop = 5	Flynn's_Barrows_Armor				1	1	4709	1000	4713	1000	4715	1000	4717	1000	4721	1000	4723	1000	4725	1000	4729	1000	4731	1000	4733	1000	4737	1000	4739	1000	4746	1000	4750	1000	4752	1000	4754	1000	4758	1000	4760	1000

i’ve made a shop before the only difference is that i didn’t change their location oh and i also changedn buy and sell to 1.

plz help its driving me mad (you may already have noticed i’m not very experienced at making servers it my first) :eek: plz help a poor newb out! ;D

do i need to change anything in shophandler.java or something?
